replies.body:
I'm going to go ahead and lock this thread now due to it violating the No Spamming/Trolling section of the [Universal Rules](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/4LgZ2EwM-universal-rules). Relevant rule: 

>_Spamming / Trolling_

>* Here is a breakdown of the various types of spam / trolling that we look for:
  * Posting designed to bait conversation or falsify content

In the future please refrain from making posts like this or risk suffering the consequences for failing to do so.

Thank you, and have a good day.

yeah riot

this guy is a shining beacon of exemplary behaviour

This guy did nothing wrong. The same way tyler1, iwilldominate, Trump and Hitler.
----
If you can't see why you are toxic go ahead and wait for your perma that's coming.

> [{quoted}](name=SiegFx1,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=mko3XX1T,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2017-06-18T17:10:38.991+0000)
>
> This guy did nothing wrong. The same way tyler1, iwilldominate, Trump and Hitler.
> ----
> If you can't see why you are toxic go ahead and wait for your perma that's coming.

I was perm'd 4 times when I first started playing. I've been reformed for 3 years. Me returning to being toxic is a result of the shit state of the game

Nah it's a result of the shit state of your personality. You just come off as the type of player who thinks they are owed a win every time they queue up, and will flame their team because they aren't playing the game the way you expect it to be played. 

You aren't challenger, you aren't even remotely good, check your ego at the door. If you aren't typing useful information in that chat, you shouldn't be hitting the enter key. Calling your team mates out on mistakes is never going to help your game. They aren't going to adapt because some plat player who thinks he's god's gift to league told them they suck. Now they are just busy typing to defend themselves. 

There isn't anything you need to say that you can't say with pings. You hitting the enter key is just hurting your own elo.
It's not the game, it's yourself. You have displaced anger and attack your team mates when you think things are not going well.
Read everything You just posted i could close my eyes and i would have found a negative comment
i did nothing wrong
You asked for a ban bud iOnlyPlayOffMeta: ban me so i dont have to play this shit game anymore XDDDDDD
read the following comments
you type too much my dude

Game1: Calling people autistic, calling them monkeys and in general just being a verbally abusive jerk to your teammates. There's also these lines right here: 

>iOnlyPlayOffMeta: when i get banned im going to script
iOnlyPlayOffMeta: and boost accts
iOnlyPlayOffMeta: for free money
iOnlyPlayOffMeta: and ruin more games
iOnlyPlayOffMeta: so either rito can ban for toxic
iOnlyPlayOffMeta: have toxic player or cheating player
iOnlyPlayOffMeta: Their choice

Here you're basically asking Riot to ban you and your next accounts on sight because you don't want to behave in a mature and respectful manner. My verdict: Punish.

Game2: Question mark spamming along with similar behavior from game one where you call your twitch player autistic and trash. Again, you'd rather insult your teammates every second you get than behave in a mature and respectful manner. My verdict: Punish.

Game3: More of the same poor behavior from the previous two games. My verdict: Punish.

Conclusion: It's very easy to see why you got punished. You constantly verbally abuse and harass your teammates whenever they mess up and/or do something that you don't like, and you do it for the whole entire game pretty much non-stop. Combine that with the spamming in game 2 and the threat to script, boost accounts and ruin more games when you get banned and it's easy to see that you have no intentions of behaving in a mature and respectful manner.

Advice: 

* People make mistakes, even you. The last thing they need is you harassing them over it all game long. Build people up instead of breaking them down.
* Don't threaten to script or boost accounts. Not only is that against the TOS but you're basically giving Riot more evidence against you.
* Spamming is both disruptive and un-needed. I know you claimed that your button was stuck but we all know that that's not true and that you were doing that to get a rise out of other players so just don't do it.
* Focus on your game instead on others. You can give advice in a mature and respectful manner if you'd like but the more time you spend harassing your teammates in chat the less time you spend actually playing the game itself.

My overall final verdict: Punish.

> [{quoted}](name=Prandine,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=mko3XX1T,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2017-06-18T20:26:49.462+0000)
>

> iOnlyPlayOffMeta: for free money
> iOnlyPlayOffMeta: and ruin more games
> iOnlyPlayOffMeta: so either rito can ban for toxic
> iOnlyPlayOffMeta: have toxic player or cheating player
> iOnlyPlayOffMeta: Their choice
> 
> Here you're basically asking Riot to ban you and your next accounts on sight because you don't want to behave in a mature and respectful manner. My verdict: Punish.
> 
> Game2: Question mark spamming along with similar behavior from game one where you call your twitch player autistic and trash. Again, you'd rather insult your teammates every second you get than behave in a mature and respectful manner. My verdict: Punish.
> 
> Game3: More of the same poor behavior from the previous two games. My verdict: Punish.
> 
> Conclusion: It's very easy to see why you got punished. You constantly verbally abuse and harass your teammates whenever they mess up and/or do something that you don't like, and you do it for the whole entire game pretty much non-stop. Combine that with the spamming in game 2 and the threat to script, boost accounts and ruin more games when you get banned and it's easy to see that you have no intentions of behaving in a mature and respectful manner.
> 
> Advice: 
> 
> * People make mistakes, even you. The last thing they need is you harassing them over it all game long. Build people up instead of breaking them down.
> * Don't threaten to script or boost accounts. Not only is that against the TOS but you're basically giving Riot more evidence against you.
> * Spamming is both disruptive and un-needed. I know you claimed that your button was stuck but we all know that that's not true and that you were doing that to get a rise out of other players so just don't do it.
> * Focus on your game instead on others. You can give advice in a mature and respectful manner if you'd like but the more time you spend harassing your teammates in chat the less time you spend actually playing the game itself.
> 
> My overall final verdict: Punish.

Dude. Holy shit triggered.

I have been reformed for 4 years and havent recieved a ban since my last 4 peroma bans that I had gotten in season 2.
The game is in such a shitty state that the game is barely worth putting effort into anymore. 

Maybe instead of trying to address individual player's toxicity, maybe changing the health of the game would positively impact player's behavior???

:thinking: Why the fuck would I want to spend another 5 minutes playing this game when it brings no joy, solely on the premise that autistic RITO makes shitty balance changes. Like legit Twitch has had a 55+% win rate in plat+ for the past 10-20 patches in a row and still no nerfs. What kind of apes work at Riot when they can't simply look at statistics and tone down numbers as a temporary solution to an on-going epidemic of shitty balance

Instead of immediately saying "OH he's being toxic" look at it from the player's perspective. Why are they being toxic in the first place after changing their behavior and maintaining for such a long period of time?

> [{quoted}](name=QuickerBlade,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=mko3XX1T,comment-id=000a0000,timestamp=2017-06-19T01:40:53.042+0000)
>
> Dude. Holy shit triggered.
> 
> I have been reformed for 4 years and havent recieved a ban since my last 4 peroma bans that I had gotten in season 2.

Well unfortunately for you it seems that you've reverted back to the same kind of behavior that got your previous accounts permabanned.
> The game is in such a shitty state that the game is barely worth putting effort into anymore.

Agree to disagree here.

> Maybe instead of trying to address individual player's toxicity, maybe changing the health of the game would positively impact player's behavior???

You posted here asking how were you toxic. I pointed out how. It's fine if you disagree with my analysis but if you didn't want people to discuss your case then you shouldn't have posted on a public forum asking for people to do so.
 
> :thinking: Why the fuck would I want to spend another 5 minutes playing this game when it brings no joy, solely on the premise that autistic RITO makes shitty balance changes. Like legit Twitch has had a 55+% win rate in plat+ for the past 10-20 patches in a row and still no nerfs. What kind of apes work at Riot when they can't simply look at statistics and tone down numbers as a temporary solution to an on-going epidemic of shitty balance

I can't speak for the balance team but I imagine that it's more complicated than you're making it out to be. Also, resorting to insults is a very poor way to get your point across, so I'd refrain from doing that if I were you.
 
> Instead of immediately saying "OH he's being toxic" look at it from the player's perspective. Why are they being toxic in the first place after changing their behavior and maintaining for such a long period of time?

I don't know what your previous cases were like so I can only comment on your current case right here, and in your case you're constantly verbally abusing and harassing other players for doing things that you don't like. Everyone snaps from time to time (even me) but you should know by now that you only get punished for consistently poor behavior. Next time if someone is acting up just mute, report and move on instead of resorting to insults and harassment, as that's what got you punished in this particular instance.

> [{quoted}](name=Prandine,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=mko3XX1T,comment-id=000a00000000,timestamp=2017-06-19T03:10:42.343+0000)
>
> Well unfortunately for you it seems that you've reverted back to the same kind of behavior that got your previous accounts permabanned.
> 
> Agree to disagree here.
> 
> You posted here asking how were you toxic. I pointed out how. It's fine if you disagree with my analysis but if you didn't want people to discuss your case then you shouldn't have posted on a public forum asking for people to do so.
> 
> I can't speak for the balance team but I imagine that it's more complicated than you're making it out to be. Also, resorting to insults is a very poor way to get your point across, so I'd refrain from doing that if I were you.
> 
> I don't know what your previous cases were like so I can only comment on your current case right here, and in your case you're constantly verbally abusing and harassing other players for doing things that you don't like. Everyone snaps from time to time (even me) but you should know by now that you only get punished for consistently poor behavior. Next time if someone is acting up just mute, report and move on instead of resorting to insults and harassment, as that's what got you punished in this particular instance.

I know why I was punished I've just been completely done with this fucking game.
This post was a bait.

This game is so fucking easy to balance. The problems are obvious by playing against it. Twitch has zero reasonable counterplay in his kit with too much power. A rework is needed. Azir was dumpstered until rework, why isn't twitch? Ahri's been retardedly strong for many many patches all because her power isn't shifted correctly in her kit. Lucian's broken because of the buffs and bork buffs at the same time. Draven got HIS NUMBERS BUFFED for whatever fucking ape reason they decided that it was a good idea. Lulu's busted because of her point-n-click hard cc and blatantly overloaded kit. Power needs to be shifted in some way to allow counterplay.
{{item:3165}}  is literally a staple item for 99.99% of mages in the game because its component gives infinite lane mana, 50% of the max cdr cap, a fuckton of ap, and mana.
It only takes a LITTLE BIT of brain cells to actually address the problems. 

**Not even going to mention all the problems (both being broken, op, or under powered) with Zac, Trynd, Kayle, Karma, Kled, pantheon, Eve's perma stealth "mechanic",  Kogmaw, Fiora, Thresh, Galio, Lux, Annie, Syndra, Trundle, Voli, Lissandra, Ivern, AD Kennen.**

I mean what the FUCK are these RUMBLE BUFFS???? Oh yeah it's because Riot has to make the Pros look good by buffing LCS champions at the start of the comp season and then nerfing them after worlds. Say hello to Sivir, Ashe, Gnar, Braum, Gragas buffs up and coming.

> I don't know what your previous cases were like so I can only comment on your current case right here, and in your case you're constantly verbally abusing and harassing other players for doing things that you don't like. Everyone snaps from time to time (even me) but you should know by now that you only get punished for consistently poor behavior. Next time if someone is acting up just mute, report and move on instead of resorting to insults and harassment, as that's what got you punished in this particular instance.


I've had personal issues lately where I'm now being drugged 24-7 and have probably dropped 40IQ points. Constant violent thoughts and nightmares that I've bottled up for 18 years. I think snapping is an understatement.
